project: Compliance Crisis — Department Edition (Flexible 5–24 Player Version)

scaling_logic.notes: Moderator may override role distribution at any time.

win_conditions.customers: Refunds reach or exceed the Refund Target.
win_conditions.sales: All remaining Customers are Sold To.

upsell.description: Sales targets a Customer at night.

sold_to.description: Player remains alive and can speak.

complaint.effect: +1 automatic vote next day unless protected by Sales Manager.

sales_manager.description: Protects one Sales-aligned player from complaint effects.

refunds.exception: 0 if the suspended player was Upsold the previous night.

voting.ballot: Complaint target + 1–2 moderator nominees + No Suspension

design_notes.analyst_overlap: Analyst should overlap one player across nights to triangulate alignments.
design_notes.complaint_pressure: Complaint drives day cycle; Sales Manager adds deception.
design_notes.balance_knob: Refund Target and Sales Manager presence tune difficulty.
design_notes.visibility_knob: Upsold/Sold To visibility can be toggled for complexity.
